Package dk.pervasive.jcaf

Interface Summary
ContextActuator This interface defines a Context Actuator, i.e.
ContextClientHandler This interface defines a Context Client Handler.
ContextItem This interface defines a context item -- i.e.
ContextService This interface defines a Context Service.
ContextTransformer This interface defines a context transformer.
DiscoveryListener Implementations of this interface receives notification about discovery of entities searched over a range of peer-to-peer Context Services.
Entity This interface defines an Entity in the real world that we want to model in order to keep track of its context.
EntityConfig This interface defines an Entiry Configuration.
EntityEnvironment Defines a set of methods that a entity uses to communicate with its ContextService container, for example, to get a RMI handle to other processes, get Context Translators, dispatch requests, or write to a log file.
EntityListener Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity.
EntityListenerHandler This interface defines a Entity Listener Handler.
PeerHandler This interface defines a peer-to-peer handler for context services, including locating peers based on their URI.
Relationship This interface is an empty placeholder for modelling relationships between an entity's context and its context items.
RemoteContextActuator  
RemoteContextClient  
RemoteContextMonitor  
RemoteDiscoveryListener Implementations of this interface receives notification about discovering of an Entity.
RemoteEntityListener Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity.
SecureContextService This interface represents a secure context service.
TransformerRepository A Transformer Repository hold a range of Context Transformer, who can transfomr from one (or more) types of context information to another.
XMLSerializable This interface is used to serialize an object to XML.
 

Class Summary
Context The Context class represents a simple context for an Entity, which contains various types of ContextItem.
ContextEvent A generic event which indicates that context has been changed.
DiscoveryEvent A generic event which indicates that an Entity have been discovered.
Entities  
 

Exception Summary
ContextTransformerException Signals that an error occured while transforming context information.
EntityNotFoundException
